channel.title: Noble Gossip Buff
channel.description:
I propose reducing feedback in general, but increasing it in particular for Nobles. For example:
- Physicians are still informed when they heal an attack or cure a bleed, but not whether it was an attack or a bleed. Only a Noble's Gossip can tell.
- Butlers and Drunks are not informed whether their target was immune. Only cooperation with a Noble can determine this.
- Etc.

item.title: Noble Gossip Buff
item.dc:creator: WindwardAway
item.description:
is this supposed to make it harder to fakeclaim noble?

Read full topic

item.title: Noble Gossip Buff

item.description:
I propose reducing feedback in general, but increasing it in particular for Nobles. For example:

  • Physicians are still informed when they heal an attack or cure a bleed, but not whether it was an attack or a bleed. Only a Noble’s Gossip can tell.

  • Butlers and Drunks are not informed whether their target was immune. Only cooperation with a Noble can determine this.

  • Etc.
